name: American Indian Health and Family Services (AIHFS)
description: This nonprofit health and community wellness center empowers underserved populations in Southeast Michigan through culturally grounded health and family services, integrating traditional Native American healing with contemporary medicine. They offer services related to pregnancy, family, and infant health, as well as community wellness

name: Mshkiki Community Clinic (Pokagon Band of Potawatomi)
